Requirements¶

Installation¶

composer require crazymeeks/oauth0 v1.0.0

Alternatively, you can specify oauth0 as a dependency in your project’s existing composer.json file:

 {
   "require": {
      "crazymeeks/oauth0": "^v1.0.0"
   }
}
